title: Superiority of the First 10 Days of Dhul Hijjah - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: in this Surah Al Surah number 89 verse number 1 to2 when Allah says by Dawn by the 10 nights the MU say and it's also mentioned in volume number 8 page number 413 and if we refer to the summarized version the English translation printed Byam it is volume number 10 page number 468 and many say that these 10 nights refer to the first 10 days of D and they agree that these first 10 days of D are better than all the other days of the year it's even better than the last 10 days of Ramadan but it's mentioned number five page number 412 that though the first 10 days ofah are the best days of the full year the last 10 nights of Ramadan are the best nights of the year
